title: Tirupurâ€™s Saravana upbeat with two Ricoh buys - printweek
summary: Saravana Graphics invested in two Ricoh digital presses to expand its capabilities in commercial printing. The Ricoh Pro 8320S is used for printing variable data on garment tags and high-end commercial printing jobs, while the Ricoh Pro 7200X is used for auto duplex printing of tags and premium commercial prints.
product_or_process: Ricoh Pro 8320S and Ricoh Pro 7200X digital presses
